testcase.name: User cancel the case
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to the login page......................................passed When User logs in with username and password................................passed Then User should login and should be on home page...........................passed When User enters the fields such as title, access, assigned to, contact, company, deal, type, deadline, tags, priority, status and clicks on cancel.passed Then User should see case dashboard page....................................passed
